name: Hearts of Chaos
description: RPG veteran Warfare Studios (Vagrant Hearts, Ashes of Immortality, Shining Plume) is back with a new tale in this exciting, story-driven RPG.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 2GHz or higher Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
